name: @evolv-delivery/catalyst
description: Provides a rendering sdk for experiments

scripts.test:sandbox: npm run build && wait-on http://localhost:8000 && wait-on http://localhost:8001 && cypress run --spec cypress/integration/catalyst-test.cy.js ; pkill http-server
scripts.test: npm run serve:catalyst & npm run serve:sandbox & npm run test:sandbox
scripts.cypress: npm run serve:catalyst & npm run serve:sandbox & npm run build && wait-on http://localhost:8000 && wait-on http://localhost:8001 && cypress open ; pkill http-server

author: richardcowin
